summary: Ecco la versione Follower del preset Aesal-Nord racemenu
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][i][font=Verdana][color=#00ff00][b]Aesal Nord Follower[/b] [b] [/b][/color]

[color=#ffffff][b][size=3][i]Aesal is a young North girl, looking slim and rather taciturn.[/i][/size]
[size=3][i]She lived with her family on a small farm in the countryside near
Whiterun.[/i][/size]
[size=3][i]One night some raiders got into their home, and after brutally murdering
her parents, they stole everything they could find.[/i][/size]
[size=3][i]Fortunately (or perhaps by cunning) the young Aesal managed to escape
without being seen and to save hers life, taking away from the villains only
a few things including a precious necklace for her, a gift from her parents.[/i][/size][size=3][i]Since that day she has tried to survive by working occasionally in the
farms, in the inns and in the sawmills she found along the way,
longing to one day become a strong and capable warrior and thus
avenge her family.[/i][/size]
[size=3][i]Along her way she met many warriors who routed it to the art of survival
and war, until she reached the city of Solitude where she chose to
stay a while.[/i][/size]
[size=3][i]Now she cuts the wood next to the Winking Skeever to be able to pay for a room
for the night.[/i][/size]
[/b][/color][size=3][i][color=#ffffff][b]She waits the arrival of some adventurers ready to recruit her.
[/b][/color]
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿Race:Nord
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿Combat Style: Spellsword
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿Heavy armor, One-handed
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿Body UUNP



[/i][/size][/font][/i][/size]
author: jjmodskyrim
